duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with compute platforms in a datacenter environment to seek out different failure mechanisms, predictability, and their effect on the overall system environment.
Support system-level DRAM validation, system characterization, and failure analysis in the Cloud space.
Analyze different DRAM architectures to improve correctability.
Run and configure diagnostic software, system debug, design experiments, and analyze/interpret data.
Craft custom tools and communicate data to customers both inside and outside the organization.

education_certification.credential: Junior Level in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related Engineering Field
